Package edu.sjsu.cs.cs151.model

Class MineField

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.cs.cs151.model.MineField
  • public class MineField
extends java.lang.Object
    MineField class is a 2d array that represents a field of mines

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MineField​(int height, int width, int mines)
      Generate mine field for the first time

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void calcAdjacentMines()
      Calculate mines in eight adjacent cells w/r/t (i, j) (i - 1, j - 1), (i - 1, j), (i - 1, j + 1) (i , j - 1), [SET -1] (i , j + 1) (i + 1, j - 1), (i + 1, j), (i + 1, j + 1) -1 if mine is set at the cell 0, 1, ..., 8 otherwise
      int calculateAdjacentMineNumbers​(int x, int y)
      Check out how many mines near the specific cell
      void generateMineField()  
      Cell[][] getCells()
      Accessor to cells variable
      boolean[] getMineBoolean()  
      int getNumOfMines()  
      int getNumOfOpenedCells()  
      int getNumOfTotalCells()  
      boolean open​(int h, int w)
      Open cell at position(int h, int w)
      void toggleFlag​(int h, int w)
      Toggle flag on the cell

    • Constructor Detail

      • MineField

        public MineField​(int height,
                 int width,
                 int mines)
        Generate mine field for the first time
        Parameters:
        height - vertical number of cells
        width - horizontal number of cells
        mines - number of mines randomly placed in the field

    • Method Detail

      • calculateAdjacentMineNumbers

        public int calculateAdjacentMineNumbers​(int x,
                                        int y)
        Check out how many mines near the specific cell
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the cell
        y - y coordinate of the cell
        Returns:
        number of mines nearby

      • generateMineField

        public void generateMineField()

      • calcAdjacentMines

        public void calcAdjacentMines()
        Calculate mines in eight adjacent cells w/r/t (i, j) (i - 1, j - 1), (i - 1, j), (i - 1, j + 1) (i , j - 1), [SET -1] (i , j + 1) (i + 1, j - 1), (i + 1, j), (i + 1, j + 1) -1 if mine is set at the cell 0, 1, ..., 8 otherwise

      • getCells

        public Cell[][] getCells()
        Accessor to cells variable
        Returns:
        all cells of the mineField

      • toggleFlag

        public void toggleFlag​(int h,
                       int w)
        Toggle flag on the cell
        Parameters:
        h - vertical position of cell
        w - horizontal position of cell

      • open

        public boolean open​(int h,
                    int w)
        Open cell at position(int h, int w)
        Parameters:
        h - vertical position of cell
        w - horizontal position of cell
        Returns:
        false if it is a mine or true otherwise
